2025-06-25.content: Cloud Run [worker pools](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/deploy-worker-pools) are now available (Preview). Worker pools are specifically designed for non-request workloads.

2025-06-24.content: A new region is now available for [Cloud Run GPUs](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/services/gpu#supported-regions): `us-east4`.

2025-06-17.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/runtime-support#php) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).

Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/runtime-support#ruby) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).

2025-06-16.content: You can [configure GPU](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/jobs/gpu) in your Cloud Run job (Preview).

2025-06-09.content: You can [use request host and request path in IAM Conditions](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/securing/managing-access#conditions) when defining access control for invoking Cloud Run services.

2025-05-30.content:
For Java Cloud Run functions that use `functions-framework` version 1.4.0 or later, you
can now use the logging class `java.util.logging.Logger` to add a [unique execution
ID](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/runtimes/java#execution_id) to log outputs.

2025-05-28.content: Multiple regions now benefit from enhanced responsiveness for latency-sensitive applications for [Cloud Run service URLs](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/triggering/https-request#url).
